data.chText: 持续；继续存在；不断发生
data.enText: to keep existing or happening without stopping

data.chText: 展览要持续到7月25日。
data.enText: The exhibition continues until 25 July.

data.chText: 预计审判要持续三个月。
data.enText: The trial is expected to continue for three months.

data.chText: 这场雨整整一下午都下个不停。
data.enText: The rain continued to fall all afternoon.

data.chText: 这场雨整整一下午都下个不停。
data.enText: The rain continued falling all afternoon.

data.chText: 继续做；不停地干
data.enText: to keep doing sth without stopping

data.chText: 她想要继续工作到 60 岁。
data.enText: She wanted to continue working until she was 60.

data.chText: 他仍对我所说的一切置若罔闻。
data.enText: He continued to ignore everything I was saying.

data.chText: 调查委员会在继续做调查。
data.enText: The board of inquiry is continuing its investigations.

data.chText: 你要继续做这个项目吗？
data.enText: Are you going to continue with the project?

data.chText: （朝相同方向）走，移动；延伸
data.enText: to go or move further in the same direction

data.chText: 这条小路穿过了崎岖不平的石头地。
data.enText: The path continued over rough, rocky ground.

data.chText: 他继续走他的路。
data.enText: He continued on his way.

data.chText: 留任；维持原状
data.enText: to remain in a particular job or condition

data.chText: 我要你留任项目经理。
data.enText: I want you to continue as project manager.

data.chText: 在找到替换人员以前，她将继续做她目前的工作。
data.enText: She will continue in her present job until a replacement can be found.

data.chText: （停顿后）继续，再开始
data.enText: to start or start sth again after stopping for a time

data.chText: 这篇故事我们将在下一期里继续刊载。
data.enText: The story continues in our next issue.

data.chText: 这篇故事我们将在下一期里继续刊载。
data.enText: The story will be continued in our next issue.

data.chText: （停顿后）继续说，接着说
data.enText: to start speaking again after stopping

data.chText: 请继续往下说，我并非有意打断你的话。
data.enText: Please continue─I didn't mean to interrupt.

data.chText: “其实，”他接着说，“我想向你表示祝贺。”
data.enText: ‘In fact,’ he continued, ‘I'd like to congratulate you.’

simple_means.memory_skill: con 加强 + tin 拿住 + ue → 从头拿到尾 → 继续

ex.enText: She kept walking in the garden.
The boy kept asking me questions.

synonyms.bx: 指继续做之前所做的某事或重复做同一件事。

ex.chText: 这个婴儿一晚上都在哭。
ex.enText: The baby continued to cry all night.
He continued to work after he recovered.

ex.chText: 晚饭后我们继续下国际象棋如何？
ex.enText: Shall we continue playing chess after supper?

synonyms.bx: 指持续而不停止，也可指中断后又继续下去。

ex.chText: 噪声24个小时没有消停过。
ex.enText: The noise went on for 24 hours.

ex.chText: 他不应该这样生活下去了。
ex.enText: He oughtn't to go on living this way.

ex.chText: 巴辛接着给我们讲了些别的东西。
ex.enText: Bassin went on to tell us something different.

synonyms.bx: 指不停顿地继续下去；go on doing sth 表示继续干同一件事，而 go on to do sth 则表示干完一件事后接着干另一件事。

ex.chText: 两天以后，他们继续旅行。
ex.enText: Two days later, they resumed their journey.

ex.chText: 幕间休息之后，那位小提琴手又重新开始演奏。
ex.enText: The violinist resumed playing after the intermission.

ex.chText: 该问题在那10年的大部分时间里一直存在。
ex.enText: This problem persisted for much of the decade.

ex.chText: 由于疼痛持续不减，那位老人不得不联系自己的医生。
ex.enText: The old man has to contact his doctor as the pain persists.

synonyms.bx: 多指不好的情况持续存在。

ex.enText: Home prices continued to fall during April.

ex.chText: 生完孩子之后她将继续研究工作。
ex.enText: She will continue her research after the birth of her baby.

synonyms.bx: 既可指没有间断地持续发生、存在或进行，又可指中断后再继续。

ex.chText: 他们的友谊保持了很多年。
ex.enText: Their friendship endured over many years.

ex.chText: 她认为他的事业将会持续成功。
ex.enText: She thinks that his career is a success that will endure.

ex.chText: 寒冷的天气持续了整个2月。
ex.enText: The cold weather lasted for the whole month of February.

ex.chText: 一条好的牛仔裤可以穿10年。
ex.enText: A pair of good jeans will last you ten years.

synonyms.bx: 指持续一段时间；也指长时间存在、有效或保持良好的状态。

tr: exist over a prolonged period of time
example: The bad weather continued for two more weeks
I know it's hard," he continued, "but there is no choice
carry on--pretend we are not in the room

tr: travel onward in time or space
example: We proceeded towards Washington
She continued in the direction of the hills
We are moving ahead in time now

tr: allow to remain in a place or position or maintain a property or feature
example: We cannot continue several servants any longer
She retains a lawyer
The family's fortune waned and they could not keep their household staff
Our grant has run out and we cannot keep you on
We kept the work going as long as we could
She retained her composure
this garment retains its shape even after many washings

tr: keep or maintain in unaltered condition
example: preserve the peace in the family
continue the family tradition
Carry on the old traditions

tr: continue a certain state, condition, or activity
example: Keep on working!
We continued to work into the night
Keep smiling
We went on working until well past midnight

tr: span an interval of distance, space or time
example: The war extended over five years
The period covered the turn of the century
My land extends over the hills on the horizon
This farm covers some 200 acres
The Archipelago continues for another 500 miles

tr: continue in a place, position, or situation
example: After graduation, she stayed on in Cambridge as a student adviser
Stay with me, please
despite student protests, he remained Dean for another year
She continued as deputy mayor for another year
The demonstration continued after a break for lunch

tr: do something repeatedly and showing no intention to stop
example: We continued our research into the cause of the illness
The landlord persists in asking us to move

value.def: If someone or something continues to do something, they keep doing it and do not stop.

example.ex: I hope they continue to fight for equal justice after I'm gone...
example.tran: 我希望我走了以后他们能继续为司法公正而战。

example.ex: They are determined to continue working when they reach retirement age...
example.tran: 他们决定在达到退休年龄后继续工作。

example.ex: There is no reason why you should not continue with any sport or activity you already enjoy.
example.tran: 没有理由停下你一直在进行的体育运动或活动。

value.def: If something continues or if you continue it, it does not stop happening.

example.ex: He insisted that the conflict would continue until conditions were met for a ceasefire...
example.tran: 他坚持认为除非满足停火条件，否则冲突会继续下去。

example.ex: But as the investigation continued, the plot began to thicken...
example.tran: 但是随着调查的继续深入，情况开始变得复杂起来。

example.ex: Outside the building people continue their vigil, huddling around bonfires.
example.tran: 在房子外面，人们挤在篝火旁边，继续守夜。

value.def: If you continue with something, you start doing it again after a break or interruption.

example.ex: I went up to my room to continue with my packing...
She looked up for a moment, then continued drawing.
example.tran: 她抬头看了一下，然后继续画画。

value.def: If something continues or if you continue it, it starts again after a break or interruption.

example.ex: He denies 18 charges. The trial continues today...
example.tran: 他否认了18项指控。审判今天继续。

example.ex: Once, he did dive for cover but he soon reappeared and continued his activities.
example.tran: 他确实一度销声匿迹，但是很快就重出江湖，继续他的各种活动。

value.def: If you continue, you begin speaking again after a pause or interruption.

example.ex: 'You have no right to intimidate this man,' Alison continued...
example.tran: “你没有权利威胁这个人，”艾莉森接着说。

example.ex: Tony drank some coffee before he continued...
example.tran: 托尼喝了点咖啡继续说。

value.def: If you continue as something or continue in a particular state, you remain in a particular job or state.

example.ex: He had hoped to continue as a full-time career officer...
example.tran: 他曾经希望继续当一名全职的职业事务员。

example.ex: For ten days I continued in this state.
example.tran: 我的这种状况持续了10天。

value.tran: 继续(做某项工作或处于某种状态)

value.def: If you continue in a particular direction, you keep walking or travelling in that direction.

example.ex: He continued rapidly up the path, not pausing until he neared the Chapter House.
example.tran: 他匆匆地继续沿着这条路走，一直快到牧师会礼堂时才停下来。

value.def: If a road or path continues somewhere, it goes there after the place you have mentioned.

example.ex: The main road continues towards Viterbo before turning right to Bolsena.
example.tran: 大路一直延伸到维泰博，之后右转通向博尔塞纳。

trans: 继续做某事；继续做事；继续做另一件事

partsOfSpeech.dec: abs 离去 + tin 拿住 + ence 表行为 → 不再拿住 → 戒除
at 加强 + tain 拿住 → 稳稳拿住 → 获得
attain 获得，达到 + able 能…的 → 可以得到的
attain 获得，达到 + ment 表名词 → 获得的东西 → 成就
con 加强 + tain 拿住 → 统统拿住 → 包含
contain 包含，容纳 + er 表物 → 容器
con 加强 + ten 拿住 + t → 拿住时的量 → 容量，引申为满足的
con 加强 + tin 拿住 + ue → 从头拿到尾 → 继续
con 加强 + tin 拿住 + uous …的，continue的形容词 → 连续不断的
de 加强 + tain 拿住 → 拘留
dis 不 + content 满意的 → 不满的
enter 进入 + tain 拿住 → 在〔工作〕中间抓住时间〔休息〕→ 娱乐
im 不 + pertinent 恰当的；相干的 → 不相干的；无礼的
main 逗留 + tain 拿住 → 留住 → 维持
main 主要的；最重要的（留下的都是精华 → 主要的）+ ten 拿住 + ance，maintain 的名词 → 维护；坚持
ob 加强 + tain 拿住 → 拿到 → 获得
per 自始至终 + tain 拿住 → 始终握住不让两者分开 →〔两者〕从属；相关
per 自始至终 + tin 拿住 + ent 具有…性质的，关于…的 → 始终抓住 → 相干的
re 重新 + tain 拿住 → 重新拿回 → 保留
re 重新 + ten 拿住 + tion，retain 的名词 → 保留；持久力
sus 下 + tain 拿住 → 拿住下面使稳固 → 支持
sus 下，后 + ten 拿住 + ance，sustain 的名词 → 粮食；支持
ten 拿住 + able 能…的 → 能拿住的 → 可守住的
ten 拿住 + acious 有…性质的 → 拿住不放的 → 固执的
ten 拿住 + acity 表状态 → 固执；不屈不挠
ten 拿住 + ant 表人 → 拿〔钱〕租房之人 → 房客
ten 拿住 + ancy 表状况 → 租赁（期限）
ten 拿住 + ure 表结果 → 拿住 → 占有权
un 不 + tenable 可守住的 → 不可防守的
